properties.description: Pipeline that calculates query duration of distributed Polaris queries every day.

activities.name: GetFiles
activities.description: Get files to be processed from Cosmos.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
DISTINCT 
a.filepath(1) as [filename], 
a.filepath() as [filepath]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK'https://sqldb-prod-c11.azuredatalakestore.net/webhdfs/v1/local/SqlAzure/Production/ssDaily/MonVdwQueryOperation/Parquet/*.0000000.parquet',FORMAT = 'PARQUET')
as [a]
WHERE    
datediff(day,cast(a.filepath(1) as datetime), convert(date,getutcdate())) <= @{pipeline().parameters.ParameterNumberOfDays}

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterates through the cosmos files of interest.

activities.name: ProcessQueryDuration
activities.description: Calculates query duration for one daily Cosmos stream.

source.sqlReaderQuery:
with backendQueries as
(
SELECT DISTINCT
	   substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
	   [SubscriptionId_DT_String] AS [SubscriptionId], 
       [LogicalServerName_DT_String] AS [Endpoint],
	   CAST([originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] as date) as [currentDay],
	   [distributed_statement_id_DT_String] as [DistributedStatementId]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
       '@{item().filepath}',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200),
	[originalEventTimestamp_DT_DateTime] datetime2,
	distributed_statement_id_DT_String varchar(50),
	[eventName_DT_String] varchar(200)
)
  AS [a]
WHERE [AppTypeName_DT_String] = 'Worker.VDW.Frontend' and [ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%' and [eventName_DT_String] = 'vdw_distributed_computation_rpc'
),
allQueriesDuration as
(
SELECT 
	   [duration_DT_Int64] / 1000000.0 as [Duration],
	   substring([ClusterName_DT_String], charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) + 1, charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String],charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String])+1) - charindex('.',[ClusterName_DT_String]) - 1) as Region,
	   [SubscriptionId_DT_String] AS [SubscriptionId], 
       [LogicalServerName_DT_String] AS [Endpoint],
	   [distributed_statement_id_DT_String] as [DistributedStatementId],
	   [status_DT_String] as [QueryStatus]
FROM OPENROWSET (BULK 
       '@{item().filepath}',
     FORMAT = 'PARQUET') 
WITH
(
	ClusterName_DT_String varchar(100),
	[duration_DT_Int64] bigint,
	[AppTypeName_DT_String] varchar(50),
	SubscriptionId_DT_String varchar(50),
	LogicalServerName_DT_String varchar(200),
	distributed_statement_id_DT_String varchar(50),
	[status_DT_String] varchar(50),
	[eventName_DT_String] varchar(200)
)
  AS [a]
WHERE [AppTypeName_DT_String] = 'Worker.VDW.Frontend' and [ClusterName_DT_String] not like '%sqltest%' and [eventName_DT_String] = 'vdw_statement_execution' and [status_DT_String] <> 'Started'
)
select 
	a.[Region],
	a.[DistributedStatementId],
	a.[Endpoint],
	a.[Duration],
	a.[QueryStatus],
	b.[currentDay]
	from allQueriesDuration a
inner join backendQueries b on a.Region = b.Region and a.SubscriptionId = b.SubscriptionId and a.DistributedStatementId = b.DistributedStatementId and a.[Endpoint] = b.[Endpoint]
